reviewText: No... I wish I can give this Muslim hating crap negative stars. But I can't. If you want to learn about Sunni/Shiite. Look for another source.  Preferably an Islamic source. Avi Lipkin should be ashamed of himself for spouting such racist and hateful statements about Muslims. I would NOT recommend this crap. Unless you ran out of toilet paper then I would use it.
Very informative! Interesting facts and important views on the middle east population of muslims on the Islamic area based on location  etc...  Thanks  SWW
